channel.title: How do I change the xp needed to level?
channel.description: Just for example you need like 87 xp or something to level up from level 1 to level 2. How can I change that? Say I wanted it to be 100xp, what would I do?

item.title: How do I change the xp needed to level?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

zyle1992:

The equation already sets the exp needed for all levels up to the max. If you want to declare your own exp amount for the next level, you would need to use an if-else or a switch

Thats really helpful, thanks for that list. You said it sets the xp needed, but when I get that amount of xp, I still stay at level 99. Any chance you could help explain how to manually add these?
EDIT: Nvm I got it working. Thanks for the list!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the xp needed to level?

item.title: How do I change the xp needed to level?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

The equation already sets the exp needed for all levels up to the max. If you want to declare your own exp amount for the next level, you would need to use an if-else or a switch

[quote=“http://rsdo.net/RSDOnline/Guides/Experience%20formula.html”]Level 1 - 0 xp

item.title: How do I change the xp needed to level?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

fatwallet:

Maybe just edit the integers in that mathematic statement? Like change 300 to 320? Test that out, see if it works…

Just think about that, how could that work. Lets say I wanted to declare 100300000 xp to be level 129. How would it know that. Theres something else that I’m missing, it’s not changing the statement.

item.title: How do I change the xp needed to level?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

That would only make my max level 135, which I have. I’m having trouble declaring the xp needed to level up between levels 100 - 135. That code looks exactly like mine.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the xp needed to level?

item.title: How do I change the xp needed to level?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

So you found the big long equation?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 13, 2009, 11:16:59 am[/size][hr]Ok, I found it looking through my old ZymusScape source:

[code]
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 135;
}[/code]

Replace your method with that, and you should be good to go.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the xp needed to level?

item.title: How do I change the xp needed to level?
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:9, topic:288572”]ok, what’s the max level in your server? search for that in client.java Mine would be 99, so I would search for

return 99; [/quote]
I already changed mine to return 135;

Now I want to add the xp needed to level up from 100 - 135. Thats what I’m having trouble with.

Read full topic

item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Ahh I see. Well its in the mathematics part of that. Search some common terms, because i dont know where you could find that. Search:

exprate
expneeded
exprequired
exp
experience
expdefined
exptolevel

And try zyle’s tip too
